AsyncTrigger.trigger

機能/意味
Pull trigger
タイプ
AsyncTriggerクラスのメソッド
構文
trigger()
引数
なし
戻り値
なし (void)
説明
　Raises an event.
　After calling this method, control returns to the Kirikiri core, and when the Kirikiri core reaches the stage of delivering the accumulated asynchronous events, an AsyncTrigger.onFire event is generated.
